name: Vivya Under Eye Gel
description: This super absorbent under eye-gel infused with nourishing and moisturizing goodness of Heirloom rice in the powers of Golden Trice Technology .The powerful tri-peptide complex, helps to reduce the appearance of dark under eye circles and puffiness. Restores the dull and tired under eyes for a youthful and radiant look! *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
